links.title: Watch These 3 Short-Laden Stocks Leading Up To Earnings Announcements - Fitbit Inc (NYSE:FIT), Square (NYSE:SQ)
links.description: The concept of a "catalyst" is extremely important when short trading because of the volatility it can cause. Catalysts give a reason for a stock to move in the desired direction and can include any number of events, including: earnings reports, FDA decisions, mergers, spinoffs, takeovers, institutional investor activity and management shake-ups.

links.title: Terrifying Tesla VS. 18-Wheeler Crash Nearly Destroys House
links.description: An early morning crash in Delaware between a Tesla Model S and an 18-wheeler left the latter in the front yard of a house, according to local station WPVI-TV. State police officials have since concluded the driver-and more importantly, systems-of the Model S were not at fault.

Can you you say goodbye to netmetering and that big, ugly, unreliable grid?!?!?

links.title: Big batteries for every home and business: Energy storage to double this year
links.description: The global energy storage market is expected to double as homes and businesses adopt battery energy storage to supplement rooftop solar and other renewable energy systems, according to a new report by IHS. According to IHS, over the next decade, lithium-ion (Li-ion) batteries will become the mainstream energy-storage technology, with more than 80% of global energy storage installations including it by 2025.
